count tags creating by planner code
physical inventory creating count tags
planner codes count tags created by Create Count Tags by Planner Code
section.para: Count Tags are used to spearhead Inventory counts. They are created manually and on-demand, and they are not tied to any particular cycle or frequency, as Cycle Count Tags are. To create Count Tags by Planner Code, select the "Create Count Tags by Planner Code" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Create Count Tags by Planner Code

section.para: When creating Count Tags by Planner Code, you are presented with the following options:

tip.para: By default, the system allows only one unposted Count Tag per Item Site. To view all unposted Count Tags in your system, see the Count Tag Edit List.

listitem.para: Select to create Count Tags for all Planner Codes.
Specify Planner Code you want to create Count Tags for.
Enter a Planner Code pattern to select a range of Planner Codes.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions"Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Specify Warehouse the Count Tags are to be created for.

varlistentry.term: Mark Created Count Tag as Priority

listitem.para: Select to give priority status to Count Tag.

Count Tags marked as having priority status are listed first in any prioritized lists. For example, priority Count Tags will appear at the top of the Count Tag Edit List; whereas, non-priority Count Tags will appear at the bottom of the list.

varlistentry.term:
freezing of inventory
inventory freezing at count tag creation Freeze Inventory

listitem.para: The Quantity on Hand value is not updated when a transaction is posted against a frozen Item Site. Instead, Inventory transactions are pooled and then posted later when the Item Site is unfrozen--or thawed. The Quantity on Hand is later updated when the Item Site is thawed. For a detailed explanation of these concepts, see the Freezing and Thawing"Topic: Freezing and Thawing" section.

note.para: When an Item Site is frozen, any Inventory transactions entered against that Item Site--including Work Orders--will not change Quantity on Hand until after the Item Site is thawed.

listitem.para: Select to ignore Item Sites which have a Quantity on Hand balance of zero.
If selected, Count Tags will not be created for any Item Site having a Quantity on Hand balance of zero.
Select if you want to create Count Tags for an individual Warehouse Location.

If selected, you will have the option to specify which Warehouse Location you want to have Count Tags created for. This option enables you to count individual Warehouse Locations separately, without having to post counts for an entire Warehouse all at once.

listitem.para: This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering Comments related to the Count Tag. Use the Comments field to enter any instructions or other Comments that need to reach and be read by the Inventory counters.
